author: Simon Difford
description: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
name: GDPR Cocktail
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Demerara/Muscovado/brown sugar syrup (2 sugar:1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE raspberries in base of shaker
Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
